title: Introduction to R
headline: Students will get an introduction to the R coding language with this free online introduction to R course.
description: This free online Introduction to R course will teach you everything you need to know about the fundamentals of R. R is an integrated suite of software facilities for data manipulation. You will learn about R, RStudio, workspaces, and basic types as well as look into variables, data structures and operators, and data frames and tables. With this course, you will greatly enhance your statistics, data mining, and R coding skills.
courseOutcomes: Explain the role of operators and th...
Explain the role of operators and their function
Explain the role of operators and th...
Explain the role of operators and their function
courseDescription:
This free online course Introduction to R will provide you with an understanding of the basics of the R coding language. R is an integrated suite of software facilities for data manipulation. This course will be of great interest to those who work in statistics and data mining. You will learn about what the R coding language is. You will be able to explain variables, including basic types of variables, dates, and missing values.

Next, the course introduces you to RStudio and workspaces. The course then explains how to use vectors and matrices. The course teaches you about arrays, lists, factors, arithmetic, and relational operators. You will learn how R is designed around a true computer language allowing users to add additional functionality by defining new functions. Students will also learn about logical and assignment operators.

This course then wraps up by introducing you to data frames and tables. The course teaches you about working with data frames and data tables. By taking this free online course you will learn how to be better prepared for working with the R coding language. So why wait? Start learning today and improve your R coding skills!

Start Course Now
certificateDetail:
All Alison courses are free to enrol study and complete. To successfully complete this certificate course and become an Alison Graduate, you need to achieve 80% or higher in each course assessment. Once you have completed this certificate course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison certificate is:
  • Ideal for sharing with potential employers
  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital certificate: a downloadable certificate in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked certificate, posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security marked certificate in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.
Start Course Now

All certificate are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison certificate, please visit our FAQs. If you decide not to purchase your Alison certificate, you can still demonstrate your achievement by sharing your Learner Record or Learner Achievement Verification, both of which are accessible from your Dashboard. For more details on our certificate pricing, please visit our Pricing Page
